alert.note: Alert for Camp; Cass; Marion; Morris; Titus; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:05PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Marion, Cass, Franklin, Wood, southern Bowie, northwestern Upshur, Morris, Titus, Camp and southeastern Red River Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 405 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Vivian to near Lone Star to near Mineola. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Mount Pleasant, Atlanta, Wake Village, New Boston, Mineola, Pittsburg, Winnsboro, Leesburg, Boxelder, Nash, Mount Vernon, Daingerfield, Linden, Quitman, Hughes Springs, Lone Star, Queen City, Naples and Redwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Camp; Cass; Marion; Morris; Titus; Upshur; Wood
